content:
Noemie Boutique ‚Äì Terms & Conditions
Welcome to Noemie! By placing an order with us, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before shopping.
1. Orders & Payments
Orders will only be processed once full payment is received.
We reserve the right to cancel any orders if payment is not made within the given time frame.
Prices are final and non-negotiable once checkout is completed.
2. Product Information
We do our best to display accurate product colors and descriptions, but slight variations may occur due to lighting or screen settings.
Please refer to our size guide before purchasing. No exchanges for wrong sizing unless stated.
3. Shipping
Orders are processed within 1‚Äì3 working days.
Delivery time is estimated between 7‚Äì14 working days.
Delays caused by the courier or during festive seasons are beyond our control.
4. Refunds & Returns
Full refund is applicable only for:
‚Ä¢ Damaged items (with proof submitted within 7 days)
‚Ä¢ Orders not delivered within 14 working days from the expected date
No refunds or exchanges for change of mind or incorrect sizing.
5. Intellectual Property
All content on our website and social media (photos, designs, text) is owned by Noemie.
Reproduction or use without permission is strictly prohibited.
6. Privacy
Your personal information is kept confidential and used only for order processing, shipping, and customer communication.
We will never share your data with third parties without consent.
For any questions or concerns, please email us at
bynoemie0@gmail.com
.
Thank you for supporting
Noemie

content:
Noemie Boutique Refund Policy
At Noemie, we value your satisfaction and aim to provide high-quality products and service. Please refer to our refund policy below:
Full Refund for Damaged Products
If you receive a damaged item, kindly contact us within 7 days of receiving your order.
Proof of damage (e.g., photo or video) is required for verification.
Full Refund for Delayed Delivery
If your order is not delivered within 14 days from the expected delivery date, you are eligible for a full refund.
Please reach out with your order details for assistance.
Return Conditions
Items must be returned in their original condition, including tags and packaging, if applicable.
Refunds will be issued to your original payment method within 7‚Äì10 business days after approval.
Shipping fees are non-refundable unless the issue is caused by us.
Exchanges or refunds are only allowed if the item received is damaged or defective.
For any refund or return inquiries, please contact us at
bynoemie0@gmail.com
.
Thank you for shopping with Noemie!

content:
Noemie Boutique Shipping Policy
At Noemie, we aim to deliver your order safely and on time. Please review our updated shipping policy below:
üì¶ Processing Time
All orders are processed within
1‚Äì3 working days
(excluding weekends and public holidays). Once your parcel is shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email.
üöö Delivery Time
Estimated delivery time is
7‚Äì14 working days
after dispatch.
Please note: Delivery times may vary depending on your location, public holidays, and courier service delays.
üíå Shipping Fee
West Malaysia:
RM10 flat rate
East Malaysia:
RM18 flat rate
Free shipping
on orders over
RM200
(within Malaysia only)
üì¶ Courier Service
Courier services will be
assigned by Noemie
based on availability and location.
Customers are not allowed to choose the courier service.
We will ensure the most suitable delivery partner is selected for your area.
üìçShipping Coverage
We currently ship within
Malaysia
only. For international shipping inquiries, please contact us directly.
üîé Order Tracking
You will receive a
tracking link via email
once your order has been shipped. You can check your parcel‚Äôs status anytime.
For any shipping-related questions, feel free to contact us at
bynoemie0@gmail.com
or
+6014-593 6564
.
Thank you for shopping with
Noemie
